name: arch::cpu::cpuid::query_xsave_area_size

arch::cpu::cpuid::cpuid.doc:
Executes the CPUID instruction for the given leaf and subleaf.

 This method will return `None` if the leaf is not supported.

doc: Queries the size in bytes of the XSAVE area containing states enabled by `XCRO` and `IA32_XSS`.
